mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWBOARD(PLACE_SEQ, UUID_NAME, ORIGIN_NAME, IMG_URL, CONTENT) VALUES(#{place_seq},#{uuid_name}, #{origin_name},#{img_url},#{content})
mapper.select: SELECT PLACE_SEQ, UUID_NAME, ORIGIN_NAME, IMG_URL, CONTENT FROM REVIEWBOARD WHERE PLACE_SEQ=#{place_seq}

SELECT ONEDAY_SEQ, NOTE_SEQ, ONEDAY_DELFLAG, ONEDAY_TITLE, ONEDATE, REPORTCHK, ONE_READCNT, ONEDAY_PUBLIC, EMAIL FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY ONEDAY_SEQ DESC) RN, ONEDAY_SEQ, o.NOTE_SEQ, ONEDAY_DELFLAG, ONEDAY_TITLE, ONEDATE, REPORTCHK, ONE_READCNT, ONEDAY_PUBLIC,EMAIL FROM ONEDAY o JOIN NOTE n ON o.NOTE_SEQ = n.NOTE_SEQ WHERE ONEDAY_DELFLAG = 'N' AND ONEDAY_PUBLIC = 'Y') WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{last}
